verses.english: Why do the heathen rage, and the people imagine a vain thing?

derivation: or מַה; or מָ; or מַ; also מֶה; a primitive particle;
strongs_def: properly, interrogative what? (including how? why? when?); but also exclamation, what! (including how!), or indefinitely what (including whatever, and even relatively, that which); often used with prefixes in various adverbial or conjunctive senses
gloss: how (long, oft, (-soever)), (no-) thing, what (end, good, purpose, thing), whereby(-fore, -in, -to, -with), (for) why.

strongs_def: to be tumultuous
gloss: rage.

derivation: rarely (shortened) גֹּי; apparently from the same root as H1465 (גֵּוָה) (in the sense of massing);
strongs_def: a foreign nation; hence, a Gentile; also (figuratively) a troop of animals, or a flight of locusts
gloss: Gentile, heathen, nation, people.

derivation: or לְאוֹם; from an unused root meaning to gather;
strongs_def: a community
gloss: nation, people.

strongs_def: to murmur (in pleasure or anger); by implication, to ponder
gloss: imagine, meditate, mourn, mutter, roar, [idiom] sore, speak, study, talk, utter.

strongs_def: emptiness; figuratively, a worthless thing; adverbially, in vain
gloss: empty, to no purpose, (in) vain (thing), vanity.

verses.english: The kings of the earth set themselves, and the rulers take counsel together, against the LORD, and against his anointed, saying,

strongs_def: to place (any thing so as to stay); reflexively, to station, offer, continue
gloss: present selves, remaining, resort, set (selves), (be able to, can, with-) stand (fast, forth, -ing, still, up).

strongs_def: a king
gloss: king, royal.

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm;
strongs_def: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
gloss: [idiom] common, country, earth, field, ground, land, [idiom] natins, way, [phrase] wilderness, world.

strongs_def: probably to be heavy, i.e. (figuratively) honorable
gloss: prince, ruler.

strongs_def: to set (literally or figuratively); intensively, to found; reflexively, to sit down together, i.e. settle, consult
gloss: appoint, take counsel, establish, (lay the, lay for a) found(-ation), instruct, lay, ordain, set, [idiom] sure.

strongs_def: properly, a unit, i.e. (adverb) unitedly
gloss: alike, at all (once), both, likewise, only, (al-) together, withal.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

strongs_def: anointed; usually a consecrated person (as a king, priest, or saint); specifically, the Messiah
gloss: anointed, Messiah.

verses.english: Let us break their bands asunder, and cast away their cords from us.

strongs_def: to tear off
gloss: break (off), burst, draw (away), lift up, pluck (away, off), pull (out), root out.

derivation: apparent contracted from H226 (אוֹת) in the demonstrative sense of entity;
strongs_def: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
gloss: (as such unrepresented in English).

derivation: also (in plural) feminine מוֹסֵרָה; or מֹסְרָה; from H3256 (יָסַר);
strongs_def: properly, chastisement, i.e. (by implication) a halter; figuratively, restraint
gloss: band, bond.

strongs_def: to throw out, down or away (literally or figuratively)
gloss: adventure, cast (away, down, forth, off, out), hurl, pluck, throw.

derivation: or מִנִּי; or מִנֵּי; (constructive plural) (Isaiah 30:11); for H4482 (מֵן);
strongs_def: properly, a part of; hence (prepositionally), from or out of in many senses
gloss: above, after, among, at, because of, by (reason of), from (among), in, [idiom] neither, [idiom] nor, (out) of, over, since, [idiom] then, through, [idiom] whether, with.

derivation: or עֲבוֹת; or (feminine) עֲבֹתָה; the same as H5687 (עָבֹת);
strongs_def: something intwined, i.e. a string, wreath or foliage
gloss: band, cord, rope, thick bough (branch), wreathen (chain).

verses.english: He that sitteth in the heavens shall laugh: the Lord shall have them in derision.

strongs_def: properly, to sit down (specifically as judge. in ambush, in quiet); by implication, to dwell, to remain; causatively, to settle, to marry
gloss: (make to) abide(-ing), continue, (cause to, make to) dwell(-ing), ease self, endure, establish, [idiom] fail, habitation, haunt, (make to) inhabit(-ant), make to keep (house), lurking, [idiom] marry(-ing), (bring again to) place, remain, return, seat, set(-tle), (down-) sit(-down, still, -ting down, -ting (place) -uate), take, tarry.

derivation: dual of an unused singular שָׁמֶה; from an unused root meaning to be lofty;
strongs_def: the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)
gloss: air, [idiom] astrologer, heaven(-s).

strongs_def: to laugh (in pleasure or detraction); by implication, to play
gloss: deride, have in derision, laugh, make merry, mock(-er), play, rejoice, (laugh to) scorn, be in (make) sport.

strongs_def: the Lord (used as a proper name of God only)
gloss: (my) Lord.

strongs_def: to deride; by implication (as if imitating a foreigner) to speak unintelligibly
gloss: have in derision, laugh (to scorn), mock (on), stammering.

verses.english: Then shall he speak unto them in his wrath, and vex them in his sore displeasure.

strongs_def: at that time or place; also as a conjunction, therefore
gloss: beginning, for, from, hitherto, now, of old, once, since, then, at which time, yet.

strongs_def: perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue
gloss: answer, appoint, bid, command, commune, declare, destroy, give, name, promise, pronounce, rehearse, say, speak, be spokesman, subdue, talk, teach, tell, think, use (entreaties), utter, [idiom] well, [idiom] work.

derivation: (but only used in the shortened constructive form אֶל ); a primitive particle; properly, denoting motion towards, but occasionally used of a quiescent position, i.e.
strongs_def: near, with or among; often in general, to
gloss: about, according to, after, against, among, as for, at, because(-fore, -side), both...and, by, concerning, for, from, [idiom] hath, in(-to), near, (out) of, over, through, to(-ward), under, unto, upon, whether, with(-in).

strongs_def: properly, the nose or nostril; hence, the face, and occasionally a person; also (from the rapid breathing in passion) ire
gloss: anger(-gry), [phrase] before, countenance, face, [phrase] forebearing, forehead, [phrase] (long-) suffering, nose, nostril, snout, [idiom] worthy, wrath.

strongs_def: a burning of anger
gloss: sore displeasure, fierce(-ness), fury, (fierce) wrath(-ful).

strongs_def: to tremble inwardly (or palpitate), i.e. (figuratively) be (causative, make) (suddenly) alarmed or agitated; by implication to hasten anxiously
gloss: be (make) affrighted (afraid, amazed, dismayed, rash), (be, get, make) haste(-n, -y, -ily), (give) speedy(-ily), thrust out, trouble, vex.

verses.english: Yet have I set my king upon my holy hill of Zion.

strongs_def: I
gloss: I, (as for) me, mine, myself, we, [idiom] which, [idiom] who.

strongs_def: to pour out, especially a libation, or to cast (metal); by analogy, to anoint aking
gloss: cover, melt, offer, (cause to) pour (out), set (up).

strongs_def: a king
gloss: king, royal.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

derivation: the same (regularly) as H6725 (צִיּוּן)lemma צִיוּן missing dagesh, corrected to צִיּוּן;
strongs_def: Tsijon (as a permanent capital), a mountain of Jerusalem
gloss: Zion.

strongs_def: a mountain or range of hills (sometimes used figuratively)
gloss: hill (country), mount(-ain), [idiom] promotion.

strongs_def: a sacred place or thing; rarely abstract, sanctity
gloss: consecrated (thing), dedicated (thing), hallowed (thing), holiness, ([idiom] most) holy ([idiom] day, portion, thing), saint, sanctuary.

verses.english: I will declare the decree: the LORD hath said unto me, Thou art my Son; this day have I begotten thee.

strongs_def: properly, to score with a mark as a tally or record, i.e. (by implication) to inscribe, and also to enumerate; intensively, to recount, i.e. celebrate
gloss: commune, (ac-) count; declare, number, [phrase] penknife, reckon, scribe, shew forth, speak, talk, tell (out), writer.

derivation: (but only used in the shortened constructive form אֶל ); a primitive particle; properly, denoting motion towards, but occasionally used of a quiescent position, i.e.
strongs_def: near, with or among; often in general, to
gloss: about, according to, after, against, among, as for, at, because(-fore, -side), both...and, by, concerning, for, from, [idiom] hath, in(-to), near, (out) of, over, through, to(-ward), under, unto, upon, whether, with(-in).

strongs_def: an enactment; hence, an appointment (of time, space, quantity, labor or usage)
gloss: appointed, bound, commandment, convenient, custom, decree(-d), due, law, measure, [idiom] necessary, ordinance(-nary), portion, set time, statute, task.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: to say (used with great latitude)
gloss: answer, appoint, avouch, bid, boast self, call, certify, challenge, charge, [phrase] (at the, give) command(-ment), commune, consider, declare, demand, [idiom] desire, determine, [idiom] expressly, [idiom] indeed, [idiom] intend, name, [idiom] plainly, promise, publish, report, require, say, speak (against, of), [idiom] still, [idiom] suppose, talk, tell, term, [idiom] that is, [idiom] think, use (speech), utter, [idiom] verily, [idiom] yet.

derivation: (but only used in the shortened constructive form אֶל ); a primitive particle; properly, denoting motion towards, but occasionally used of a quiescent position, i.e.
strongs_def: near, with or among; often in general, to
gloss: about, according to, after, against, among, as for, at, because(-fore, -side), both...and, by, concerning, for, from, [idiom] hath, in(-to), near, (out) of, over, through, to(-ward), under, unto, upon, whether, with(-in).

strongs_def: a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)
gloss: [phrase] afflicted, age, (Ahoh-) (Ammon-) (Hachmon-) (Lev-) ite, (anoint-) ed one, appointed to, ([phrase]) arrow, (Assyr-) (Babylon-) (Egypt-) (Grec-) ian, one born, bough, branch, breed, [phrase] (young) bullock, [phrase] (young) calf, [idiom] came up in, child, colt, [idiom] common, [idiom] corn, daughter, [idiom] of first, [phrase] firstborn, foal, [phrase] very fruitful, [phrase] postage, [idiom] in, [phrase] kid, [phrase] lamb, ([phrase]) man, meet, [phrase] mighty, [phrase] nephew, old, ([phrase]) people, [phrase] rebel, [phrase] robber, [idiom] servant born, [idiom] soldier, son, [phrase] spark, [phrase] steward, [phrase] stranger, [idiom] surely, them of, [phrase] tumultuous one, [phrase] valiant(-est), whelp, worthy, young (one), youth.

derivation: or (shortened); אַתָּ; or אַת; feminine (irregular) sometimes אַתִּי; plural masculine אַתֶּם; feminine אַתֶּן; or אַתֵּנָהlemma אתֵּנָה missing vowel, corrected to אַתֵּנָה; or אַתֵּנָּה; a primitive pronoun of the second person;
strongs_def: thou and thee, or (plural) ye and you
gloss: thee, thou, ye, you.

strongs_def: I
gloss: I, (as for) me, mine, myself, we, [idiom] which, [idiom] who.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to be hot;
strongs_def: a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
gloss: age, [phrase] always, [phrase] chronicals, continually(-ance), daily, ((birth-), each, to) day, (now a, two) days (agone), [phrase] elder, [idiom] end, [phrase] evening, [phrase] (for) ever(-lasting, -more), [idiom] full, life, as (so) long as (... live), (even) now, [phrase] old, [phrase] outlived, [phrase] perpetually, presently, [phrase] remaineth, [idiom] required, season, [idiom] since, space, then, (process of) time, [phrase] as at other times, [phrase] in trouble, weather, (as) when, (a, the, within a) while (that), [idiom] whole ([phrase] age), (full) year(-ly), [phrase] younger.

strongs_def: to bear young; causatively, to beget; medically, to act as midwife; specifically, to show lineage
gloss: bear, beget, birth(-day), born, (make to) bring forth (children, young), bring up, calve, child, come, be delivered (of a child), time of delivery, gender, hatch, labour, (do the office of a) midwife, declare pedigrees, be the son of, (woman in, woman that) travail(-eth, -ing woman).

verses.english: Ask of me, and I shall give thee the heathen for thine inheritance, and the uttermost parts of the earth for thy possession.

strongs_def: to inquire; by implication, to request; by extension, to demand
gloss: ask (counsel, on), beg, borrow, lay to charge, consult, demand, desire, [idiom] earnestly, enquire, [phrase] greet, obtain leave, lend, pray, request, require, [phrase] salute, [idiom] straitly, [idiom] surely, wish.

derivation: or מִנִּי; or מִנֵּי; (constructive plural) (Isaiah 30:11); for H4482 (מֵן);
strongs_def: properly, a part of; hence (prepositionally), from or out of in many senses
gloss: above, after, among, at, because of, by (reason of), from (among), in, [idiom] neither, [idiom] nor, (out) of, over, since, [idiom] then, through, [idiom] whether, with.

strongs_def: to give, used with greatest latitude of application (put, make, etc.)
gloss: add, apply, appoint, ascribe, assign, [idiom] avenge, [idiom] be (healed), bestow, bring (forth, hither), cast, cause, charge, come, commit, consider, count, [phrase] cry, deliver (up), direct, distribute, do, [idiom] doubtless, [idiom] without fail, fasten, frame, [idiom] get, give (forth, over, up), grant, hang (up), [idiom] have, [idiom] indeed, lay (unto charge, up), (give) leave, lend, let (out), [phrase] lie, lift up, make, [phrase] O that, occupy, offer, ordain, pay, perform, place, pour, print, [idiom] pull, put (forth), recompense, render, requite, restore, send (out), set (forth), shew, shoot forth (up), [phrase] sing, [phrase] slander, strike, (sub-) mit, suffer, [idiom] surely, [idiom] take, thrust, trade, turn, utter, [phrase] weep, [phrase] willingly, [phrase] withdraw, [phrase] would (to) God, yield.

derivation: rarely (shortened) גֹּי; apparently from the same root as H1465 (גֵּוָה) (in the sense of massing);
strongs_def: a foreign nation; hence, a Gentile; also (figuratively) a troop of animals, or a flight of locusts
gloss: Gentile, heathen, nation, people.

strongs_def: properly, something inherited, i.e. (abstractly) occupancy, or (concretely) an heirloom; generally an estate, patrimony or portion
gloss: heritage, to inherit, inheritance, possession. Compare H5158 (נַחַל).

strongs_def: something seized, i.e. a possession (especially of land)
gloss: possession.

strongs_def: cessation, i.e. an end (especially of the earth); often used adverb, no further; also the ankle (in the dual), as being the extremity of the leg or foot
gloss: ankle, but (only), end, howbeit, less than nothing, nevertheless (where), no, none (beside), not (any, -withstanding), thing of nought, save(-ing), there, uttermost part, want, without (cause).

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm;
strongs_def: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
gloss: [idiom] common, country, earth, field, ground, land, [idiom] natins, way, [phrase] wilderness, world.

verses.english: Thou shalt break them with a rod of iron; thou shalt dash them in pieces like a potter's vessel.

strongs_def: properly, to spoil (literally, by breaking to pieces); figuratively, to make (or be) good fornothing, i.e. bad (physically, socially or morally)
gloss: afflict, associate selves (by mistake for H7462 (רָעָה)), break (down, in pieces), [phrase] displease, (be, bring, do) evil (doer, entreat, man), show self friendly (by mistake for H7462 (רָעָה)), do harm, (do) hurt, (behave self, deal) ill, [idiom] indeed, do mischief, punish, still, vex, (do) wicked (doer, -ly), be (deal, do) worse.

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to branch off;
strongs_def: a scion, i.e. (literally) a stick (for punishing, writing, fighting, ruling, walking, etc.) or (figuratively) a clan
gloss: [idiom] correction, dart, rod, sceptre, staff, tribe.

derivation: perhaps from the root of H1269 (בִּרְזוֹת);
strongs_def: iron (as cutting); by extension, an iron implement
gloss: (ax) head, iron.

strongs_def: something prepared, i.e. any apparatus (as an implement, utensil, dress, vessel or weapon)
gloss: armour(-bearer), artillery, bag, carriage, [phrase] furnish, furniture, instrument, jewel, that is made of, [idiom] one from another, that which pertaineth, pot, [phrase] psaltery, sack, stuff, thing, tool, vessel, ware, weapon, [phrase] whatsoever.

derivation: probably identical with H3334 (יָצַר) (through the squeezing into shape); (compare H3331 (יַצַע));
strongs_def: to mould into a form; especially as apotter; figuratively, to determine (i.e. form a resolution)
gloss: [idiom] earthen, fashion, form, frame, make(-r), potter, purpose.

strongs_def: to dash to pieces, or scatter
gloss: be beaten in sunder, break (in pieces), broken, dash (in pieces), cause to be discharged, dispersed, be overspread, scatter.

verses.english: Be wise now therefore, O ye kings: be instructed, ye judges of the earth.

strongs_def: at this time, whether adverb, conjunction or expletive
gloss: henceforth, now, straightway, this time, whereas.

strongs_def: a king
gloss: king, royal.

strongs_def: to be (causatively, make or act) circumspect and hence, intelligent
gloss: consider, expert, instruct, prosper, (deal) prudent(-ly), (give) skill(-ful), have good success, teach, (have, make to) understand(-ing), wisdom, (be, behave self, consider, make) wise(-ly), guide wittingly.

strongs_def: to chastise, literally (with blows) or figuratively (with words); hence, to instruct
gloss: bind, chasten, chastise, correct, instruct, punish, reform, reprove, sore, teach.

strongs_def: to judge, i.e. pronounce sentence (for or against); by implication, to vindicate or punish; by extenssion, to govern; passively, to litigate (literally or figuratively)
gloss: [phrase] avenge, [idiom] that condemn, contend, defend, execute (judgment), (be a) judge(-ment), [idiom] needs, plead, reason, rule.

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm;
strongs_def: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
gloss: [idiom] common, country, earth, field, ground, land, [idiom] natins, way, [phrase] wilderness, world.

verses.english: Serve the LORD with fear, and rejoice with trembling.

strongs_def: to work (in any sense); by implication, to serve, till, (causatively) enslave, etc.
gloss: [idiom] be, keep in bondage, be bondmen, bond-service, compel, do, dress, ear, execute, [phrase] husbandman, keep, labour(-ing man, bring to pass, (cause to, make to) serve(-ing, self), (be, become) servant(-s), do (use) service, till(-er), transgress (from margin), (set a) work, be wrought, worshipper,

derivation: apparent contracted from H226 (אוֹת) in the demonstrative sense of entity;
strongs_def: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
gloss: (as such unrepresented in English).

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: fear (also used as infinitive); morally, reverence
gloss: [idiom] dreadful, [idiom] exceedingly, fear(-fulness).

derivation: or (by permutation) גּוּל; a primitive root;
strongs_def: properly, to spin round (under the influence of any violent emotion), i.e. usually rejoice, or (as cringing) fear
gloss: be glad, joy, be joyful, rejoice.

derivation: or (feminine) רְעָדָהxlit rᵉâdâh corrected to rᵉʻâdâh; from H7460 (רָעַד);
strongs_def: a shudder
gloss: trembling.

verses.english: Kiss the Son, lest he be angry, and ye perish from the way, when his wrath is kindled but a little. Blessed are all they that put their trust in him.

derivation: a primitive root (identical with H5400 (נָשַׂק), through the idea of fastening up; compare H2388 (חָזַק), H2836 (חָשַׁק));
strongs_def: to kiss, literally or figuratively (touch); also (as a mode of attachment), to equip with weapons
gloss: armed (men), rule, kiss, that touched.

strongs_def: the heir (apparent to the throne)
gloss: son.

strongs_def: properly, removal; used only (in the construction) adverb as conjunction, lest
gloss: (lest) (peradventure), that...not.

strongs_def: to breathe hard, i.e. be enraged
gloss: be angry (displeased).

strongs_def: properly, to wander away, i.e. lose oneself; by implication to perish (causative, destroy)
gloss: break, destroy(-uction), [phrase] not escape, fail, lose, (cause to, make) perish, spend, [idiom] and surely, take, be undone, [idiom] utterly, be void of, have no way to flee.

strongs_def: a road (as trodden); figuratively, a course of life or mode of action, often adverb
gloss: along, away, because of, [phrase] by, conversation, custom, (east-) ward, journey, manner, passenger, through, toward, (high-) (path-) way(-side), whither(-soever).

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

derivation: a primitive root; also as denominative from H1198 (בַּעַר)
strongs_def: to kindle, i.e. consume (by fire or by eating);  to be(-come) brutish
gloss: be brutish, bring (put, take) away, burn, (cause to) eat (up), feed, heat, kindle, set (on fire), waste.

strongs_def: a little or few (often adverbial or compar.)
gloss: almost (some, very) few(-er, -est), lightly, little (while), (very) small (matter, thing), some, soon, [idiom] very.

strongs_def: properly, the nose or nostril; hence, the face, and occasionally a person; also (from the rapid breathing in passion) ire
gloss: anger(-gry), [phrase] before, countenance, face, [phrase] forebearing, forehead, [phrase] (long-) suffering, nose, nostril, snout, [idiom] worthy, wrath.

strongs_def: happiness; only in masculine plural construction as interjection, how happy!
gloss: blessed, happy.

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

strongs_def: to flee for protection; figuratively, to confide in
gloss: have hope, make refuge, (put) trust.
